TextView.android:text: IN THE MATTER OF THE CONTRACTS ACT No. 7 OF 2010
IN THE MATTER OF PROVISION OF RIHAM
HARISS INTERNATIONAL LIMITED OF Plot 32/33 Bombo Road Kawempe, P.O. Box 24972 Kampala, Uganda, (Hereinafter referred to as (“THE COMPANY”) AND
Hereinafter referred to as (“THE RECEIVING ENTITY”)

“THE COMPANY” is a renowned Foods and Beverages Manufacturer in Uganda and is desirous of enhancing its brand awareness and galvanizing its brand platform on the Ugandan Market, the company wishes to provide Refrigerators to the receiving entity to ensure display of its flagship beverages and to ensure that the customers are able to access cold beverages,

“THE RECEIVING ENTITY” is a distributor/ wholesaler/ retailer of the Company’s beverages’ in Uganda and further would like to enhance the service of the company’s beverages to the customers at the optimum consumption temperature, \n\nNOW THEREFORE THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSETH AS FOLLOWS:
The term for this Agreement (the “Term’) shall run from the date of signature for a duration of three (3) years and may be renewed for such other period as the company shall deem fit and proper.

Ownership of the Refrigerators shall remain vested in the Company at all times and the receiving entity shall have neither a valid claim nor entitlement to the supplied refrigerator. Failure to return the refrigerator/s when recalled by the company will result in the receiving entity being charged for the refrigerator/s. The Land lord of the premises of the receiving entity shall not have any right on the refrigerator at any time or any circumstances.

a) The refrigerator shall be used solely for the cooling and display of the Company’s beverages at any and all times. The receiving entity shall continue to purchase reasonable quantities of beverages from the company and shall not display any competitor’s items or any other beverages in the refrigerator/s. 
b) The receiving Entity shall position the refrigerator in the place of business as ascertained by the Company, The receiving entity shall not remove the refrigerator/s from the specified location without notifying the company in writing. Where the receiving entity does so without notifying the company, the company reserves the right to repossess the refrigerator. 
c) The receiving entity shall ensure that the refrigerator is in good working condition, switched on24hours each day, hygienically clean, fully stocked and well positioned giving visibility of the company’s products to the customers. The receiving entity shall not remove, cover, deface the refrigerator or the branding thereon. 
d) The receiving entity shall not sublet nor transfer the unit without notifying the company 
e) If the refrigerator is lost, stolen or damaged during the duration of use, the receiving entity shall be full responsible for its replacement cost. 
f) The merchandiser of Hariss International Ltd should be permitted to organize the fridge in a manner that allows him/her to restock, follow the planogram, clean the products and check for short expires.

a) Maintenance and repairs of the refrigerator is to be carried out by a certified employee of Hariss International Ltd, breach of this will result in immediate termination of the contract and recalling the refrigerator from the receiving entity. \nb) The Company reserves the right to recall/ repossess the issued refrigerator without giving reason for such recall. \nc) The Company at any time with its sole discretion without prior written notice or comp
LIABILITY FOR USE OF THE REFRIGERATOR/Ice Cooler

Liability for injury, disability and death caused by the operation of this refrigerator during the term shall be borne by the receiving entity and all the receiving entity shall indemnify the company from any loss arising from any such event.

Each party represents and warrants that it has the right, power and authority to enter into this Agreement, to grant the rights granted herein and to perform the duties and obligations described therein. The receiving entity represents and warrants that every person who shall work for on behalf of the receiving entity in connection with the usage of refrigerator/s shall be of eighteen (18) years of age and above.

In the performance of the Services hereunder, the Receiving entity shall comply with all the applicable NATIONAL laws, regulations and guidelines. The Receiving Party undertakes to comply with Company Policies in respect to its Products sales and Fridge Usage.

Neither party may assign this Agreement or any interests herein, or delegate any of its duties hereunder, to any third party without the other party\'s prior written consent. Any attempted assignment or delegation without such consent shall result into payments of costs incurred.

The receiving entity warrants and represents that it has never been, is not currently, and during the term of this Agreement, will not become an entity which has been debarred by the Government or any Authority from providing services in its distributor capacity.
This Agreement shall inure to the benefit of and be binding upon the respective heirs, representatives, successors and assigns of the parties.

This Agreement contains the entire understanding of the parties with respect to the matters herein contained and supersedes all previous agreements and undertakings with respect thereto. This agreement may be modified only by the written agreement signed by the parties.

It shall be the sole responsibility of the Licensed Agent/ Distributor in the Territory of the receiving entity to ensure that the receiving party complies with company policies in terms of stock purchases and Refrigerator usage.
Model & Branding of the Refrigerator/Ice Cooler:

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Uganda and severance of one part of the agreement for any invalidity does not invalidate the whole agreement.
FOR AND ON BEHALF OF HARISS INTERNATIONAL LIMITED,
FOR AND ON BEHALF OF RECEIVING ENTITY,
